author: stefan2
msg: Before bumping the FSFS format, add a pre-1.8 compatibility option
(svn_fs_fs__create): create format 4 FSFS for pre-1.8 compatibility

author: stefan2
msg: Add revprop packing support to pack and recovery functions.
(recover_body): call new function to handle packed revprops
(pack_shard): call new functions to handle packed revprops;
(pack_body): read repo config and pass settings to next level

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-471: Avoid Charset name bottleneck when multiple threads are using HtmlParser
Add CHANGES entry for the charset detection changes.
